evaluators.name: SCC indicates paid but account status does not indicate paid
evaluators.description: The special comment code indicates account paid, but the account status does not show paid.
evaluators.long_description:
Special comment code indicates that the account was paid

Special comment code: AU (Account Paid in Full for Less than the Full Balance), AX (Account paid from collateral), BP (Account paid through insurance), or C (Paid by Co-maker or Guarantor)

But account status does not show paid

Account status ≠ 13 (Paid or closed, zero balance), ≠ 61 (Paid in full, voluntary surrender), ≠ 62 (Paid in full, collection account), ≠ 63 (Paid in full, repossession), ≠ 64 (Paid in full, charge-off), or ≠ 65 (Paid in full, foreclosure started)

evaluators.name: Status delinquent but no DOFD
evaluators.description: Account status indicates a delinquent, or paid and previously delinquent, account but there is no date of first delinquency.
evaluators.use_notes:
This evaluator may highlight a problem with special comment code showing paid and account status showing not paid or something else that is inconsistent.

To be accurately furnished, for these special comment codes (which show paid) the Account Status code must show paid (13 or 61-65). To see indications of whether this account has actually been paid or not, review balance and amount past due.

evaluators.name: Current DOFD does not match prior DOFD
evaluators.description: This period's date of first delinquency does not match the previous period when both periods had delinquent account statuses.

evaluators.name: Paid status but DOAI not equal to DOLP
evaluators.description: A paid or settled account status indicated but date of account information is not equal to the date of last payment.

evaluators.name: Change in account status progression
evaluators.description: Prior account status indicates that the account was 30-59 days past due, but this month's account status suggests the account is 90 or more days past due.

evaluators.name: Status indicates bankruptcy but no DOFD
evaluators.description: Account indicates a discharge for Chapter 7 or 11 bankruptcy for a charged off obligation but there is no date of first delinquency.

evaluators.name: Prior status indicates paid but current is not the same
evaluators.description: Prior account status indicates that the account was paid but this month's account status is not the same.

evaluators.name: Status delinquent but no amount past due
evaluators.description: The account status indicates a delinquent account, but there is no amount past due.

evaluators.name: PHP does not match prior delinquent status
evaluators.description: When the account status for the previous period reported the account 30-59 days past due, the first entry of this payment history profile is not '1' which would imply that the previous period's account was 30-59 days past due.

evaluators.name: Deliquency status progression
evaluators.description: Prior Account Status indicates that the account was 60-89 days past due, but this month's account status suggests the account is 120 or more days past due.

evaluators.name: Lease but no original loan amount
evaluators.description: Account is an auto lease, but there is no original loan amount.

evaluators.name: Prior status shows charged off / paid but current status does not
evaluators.description: Prior account status indicates charged-off then paid in full, but the current month's account status is not the same.
